asdf
    plugin
        list
            list installed plugins
        list all
            list all available plugins
        add <plugin-name>
        update [--all]
    list <plugin>
        list installed versions
    list all <plugin>
        list all versions
    install <plugin> latest
    uninstall <plugin> <version>
    global <plugin> latest
        ~/.tool-versions
            ???
        ~/.asdf/.tool-versions
    which <plugin>
    latest <plugin>|--all
